ComicInfo.Summary:
From the artist of Marvel Comics' Devil's Reign & Daredevil, Marco Checchetto, comes a thrilling new adventure!
The team makes their way through the city in search of Derek and Laura's daughter, but finding themselves surrounded by the infected puts their lives and their unit cohesion at risk. Can they hold it together long enough to save an innocent life?
List of covers and their creators: Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Marco Checchetto | 1 | B | Cover B | Giancarlo Olivares | 2 | C | Cover C | Luca Bertele | 3 | D | Cover D | Fritz Casas | 4 | *Notes:* Cover C is a homage of the cover of The Amazing Spider-Man #129.Cover D is a homage of the cover of The Uncanny X-Men #173.
